attributes.action: Reduce the speed limit to 20 add  a speed bump bring our village back
attributes.additional_details:
For our community for our climate for our planet for our wild animals
Please help
attributes.background:
Reduce speed limit in catsfield sussex
Give us a crossing and speed bump
Please help us it is a grand prix circuit after dark
We are on a two pin bend with a 60 mph limit
We live in fear getting out of our drives for the school run is terrifying
There is no pavement or crossing

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road improvements are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
